product_name: EssenceLash Princess Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackEssence Lash Princess Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover takes away even the toughest waterproof products!
details: DetailsFeaturesRemoves tough waterproof mascaras, eyeliners, and long-lasting waterproof pencilsThe 2-phase eye-makeup removing formula is quick and easy to useGentle on all skin typesOphthalmologist testedCruelty-freeKey IngredientsChamomilla flower water moisturizes and soothes the delicate area of the eyelidsFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productMicroplastic particlesParabensGlutenLactoseItem 2633216How To UseSaturate cotton ball with Essence Lash Princess Waterproof Eye Make-up Remover. Apply to eye area and hold for several seconds, then wipe with gentle downward strokes. Repeat using fresh cotton ball if necessary.IngredientsAqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Stearate, Glycerin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Water, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Allantoin, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ci 42090 (Blue 1).
how_to_use: Saturate cotton ball with Essence Lash Princess Waterproof Eye Make-up Remover. Apply to eye area and hold for several seconds, then wipe with gentle downward strokes. Repeat using fresh cotton ball if necessary.

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: I enjoy this brands mascaras and was disappointed to experience the chemical scent/smell and that my eyes would water for about 30 minutes after using.  Also, I still had mascara smudges the next morning after use.  I'll pass continuing use of this product.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: It did not take my mascara off and it make my eye red and irritated

reviews.headline: Its just ok
reviews.comments: It works- but u have to use a lot of product and doesn't take on mascara easily, gotta do some rubbing. After a few days in a row my eyelids kind of hurt and were sore from the abuse of my cotton pad lol. So its not a terrible product, but if u wear a full face of makeup with setting spray like me, its definitely not the best choice. Wouldn't buy this again.

reviews.headline: NO NO NO
reviews.comments: Burned my eyes so bad when taking off my mascara, eyes were red for the whole night and morning,

reviews.headline: HORRIBLE AND CAUSED RED SPOTS AND BREAKING OUT!!!
reviews.comments: If you have sensitive skin DO NOT USE. This burned the skin around my eyes so bad. They do claim to be "ophthalmologically and dermatologically approved", but if enough testing was done this burning would not be allowed.

reviews.headline: Doesn't work very well
reviews.comments: This barely works as an eye makeup remover and the formula makes my eyes cloudy.

reviews.headline: BURNS
reviews.comments: This burned my eyes so bad. I have a Mary Kay eye makeup remover that I am running out of that is gentle on my eyes.  So I just picked up this Essence one. It burned and hurt so bad and didn't even do a good job removing my waterproof mascara.

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: This was recommended by the sales person and I was pleasantly surprised at how well it removes my mascara.  It works as well as the expensive brands.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: Gets the job done but you also have to deal with your eyes burning and blurry vision. And since its a oil based makeup remover you are more prone to styes

reviews.headline: Bad bad bad
reviews.comments: I rarely write reviews so that's how you know it's bad. If you have sensitive skin DO NOT USE. This burned the skin around my eyes so bad. They do claim to be "ophthalmologically and dermatologically approved", but if enough testing was done this burning would not be allowed.

reviews.headline: Will Buy Again
reviews.comments: Works great i used it to get some under lash extensions off and they came off with no hesitation and all the lash glue was also removed great for the price

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: One of my biggest issues is getting mascara off and this does the job perfectly. You don't have to be wearing the essence mascara to use it however it does work a little bit better with it.

reviews.headline: Yeaaaahnoooo :-(
reviews.comments:
Pros: Budget friendly. Get's the job done.
Cons: The burnnn.

I won't be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Great product, great price
reviews.comments: I was looking for an eye makeup remover and figured for the price and based in the good reviews to give it a shot. Was not disappointed; it takes off all of your eye makeup, even the stubborn kind and doesn't leave your delicate eye area feeling stripped. Just give it a little shake, splash onto a cotton pad/Qtip (great for taking off eyeliner) and swipe. A little goes a long way. Definitely would recommend and repurchase.

reviews.headline: This is good!
reviews.comments: This product easily takes off my eye  makeup. For the price, and the size of the bottle this is a great deal.

reviews.headline: Removes eye makeup
reviews.comments: This works well to remove eye makeup especially stubborn mascara. Can't beat the price!

reviews.headline: Effectively removes eye make-up.
reviews.comments: It removed my waterproof mascara after a few minutes of rubbing with a cotton pad, it just burned a little bit :)

reviews.headline: No scrubbing! Easy removal!
reviews.comments: Bought this because I needed a to meet the shipping minimum... I'll only be buying thid eye makeup remover from now on! No scrubbing, it removes eye makup including waterproof easily with just a few swipes. Give it a try!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: Love this product, it takes off my waterproof mascara so easily and is amazing, only thing is that it leaves my skin where I used it oily and difficult to get the oil off but overall amazing product!

reviews.headline: Great Remover!
reviews.comments:
I've struggled with finding a good makeup remover that removes all of my waterproof mascara and I decided to try this. 

I don't know if its because I use their Lash Princess Waterproof mascara but holy moly this stuff works amazingly!! No leftover mascara under my eyes and it's hydrating enough you don't feel like you're tugging at your eyelid. 

Also has a little bit of a scent but even with my sensitive skin, it doesn't irritate it.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've struggled with finding a good makeup remover that removes all of my waterproof mascara and I decided to try this. 

I don't know if its because I use their Lash Princess Waterproof mascara but holy moly this stuff works amazingly!! No leftover mascara under my eyes and it's hydrating enough you don't feel like you're tugging at your eyelid. 

Also has a little bit of a scent but even with my sensitive skin, it doesn't irritate it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Remover!

faceoff_negative.comments: It works- but u have to use a lot of product and doesn't take on mascara easily, gotta do some rubbing. After a few days in a row my eyelids kind of hurt and were sore from the abuse of my cotton pad lol. So its not a terrible product, but if u wear a full face of makeup with setting spray like me, its definitely not the best choice. Wouldn't buy this again.
faceoff_negative.headline: Its just ok

rollup.name: Lash Princess Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover
